entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
